params._amount: Amount of tokens to be burned.
params._to: Address from which tokens will be burned.

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be created and assigned.
params._to: Address to which the newly created tokens will be assigned.

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Burns a specific amount of tokens from a specified address.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Creates new tokens and assigns them to a specified address.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.
